name: Shamrock

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally ACC in all Battles by 70.

skills.name: Luck Swap
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 60% chance of removing 1 random buff from the target.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Lucky Charms
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Also has a 25% chance of placing a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on all allies for 2 turns if the [Increase C. RATE] buff is placed. Has a 5% chance of placing a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 2 turns if the [Continuous Heal] buff is placed.
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Uncatchable
skills.raw_description:
Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff on all enemies for 2 turns. Decreases the Turn Meter of all enemies by 15%. Has a 10% chance of decreasing the Turn Meter of all enemies by a further 15%.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
